article_title: Perry vs. Kasich on Medicaid expansion
article_text:

og.description: When Rick Perry directly attacked Ohio Gov. John Kasich over his Obamacare Medicaid expansion, the reaction was the childish retort: But he did it, too.
og.title: Perry vs. Kasich on Medicaid expansion - Watchdog.org
